WndProperty.name: prpVegaDemoW
WndProperty.Caption: TE vario
WndProperty.Help: This produces a fake TE vario gross vertical velocity. It can be used when in circling mode to demonstrate the lift tones. When not in circling mode, set this to a realistic negative value so speed command tones are produced.

WndProperty.name: prpVegaDemoV
WndProperty.Caption: Airspeed
WndProperty.Help: This produces a fake airspeed. It can be used when not in circling mode to demonstrate the speed command tones.

WndProperty.name: prpVegaDemoV
WndProperty.Caption: Circling
WndProperty.Help: This forces the variometer into circling or cruise mode
